mainSequence.step: Business User registers for event notifications
Business User creates a fault management job
Hub System creates a new Fault Management Job entity
Fault Management System receives a response for the created job
Fault Management Job entity initiates event creation
Hub System notifies listeners about the new event
Fault Management Job entity generates necessary data
Fault Management Job entity starts a fault management report
Hub System creates an event for new report
Hub System notifies listeners about new report event
Fault Management System receives response indicating start of new report
Fault Management System collects data for report completion
Fault Management Report entity completes data collection
Hub System updates report state to completed
Hub System notifies listeners about report state change
Fault Management System receives notification of completed report
Business User requests for report retrieval
Fault Management System retrieves the report from the system
Fault Management System presents the report to the Business User
